mapper.insert: insert into app_user(id_, username_, nickname_, email_, password_, avatar_) values(#{id}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{avatar})
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT( tradetime_, '%Y%m%d' ) as date, count(id_) as ids, sum(amount_) as amount, count(user_id) as uids from trade_detail group by month(tradetime_);
